subject: Problems using @BeforeClass with parallel methods

Hi,

It is my understanding that @BeforeClass is supposed to run before any=
 of the @Test methods contained in the same class. When I run my code in se=
quential mode, everything works fine, but when I enable parallel mode I am =
seeing that @BeforeClass no longer runs before the tests.

I am using JUnit=
 4.8.1 using this POM configuration under Maven:

                         =
       <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        =
        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    =
            <version>2.7.1</version>
                                <confi=
guration>
                                        <excludes>
              =
                                  <exclude>**/TestConfiguration.java</exclu=
de>
                                        </excludes>
                   =
                     <parallel>methods</parallel>
                         =
       </configuration>

Any ideas?

Thank you,
Gili
